title: By the King. A proclamation, requiring all cashiered officers and souldiers of the late army, to depart, and not come within twenty miles of the cities of London and VVestminster, until the twentieth day of May next.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by John Bill, Printer to the King's most Excellent Majestie, 1661. At the King's Printing-House in Black-Friers,
notes: Dated at end: Given at Our Court at Whitehall, the 13th day of April, in the thirteenth year of Our Reign.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
